front.title: Multi-dimensional Resource Aggregation in 5G Optical Fronthaul Networks

author.organization: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

abstract.t: We propose a resource assignment scheme based on multi-dimensional resource aggregation in 5G optical fronthaul networks. This new scheme can suit to the higher demand of flexible resource allocation of the fronthaul in the new 5G scenario.
